verses.name: Ezekiel 35:5
verses.text: Because thou hast had a perpetual hatred, and hast shed the blood of the children of Israel by the force of the sword in the time of their calamity, in the time that their iniquity had an end:

verses.name: Ezekiel 35:6
verses.text: Therefore, as I live, saith the Lord God, I will prepare thee unto blood, and blood shall pursue thee: sith thou hast not hated blood, even blood shall pursue thee.

verses.name: Ezekiel 35:7
verses.text: Thus will I make mount Seir most desolate, and cut off from it him that passeth out and him that returneth.
